snippet: A fight this week involving Chris Brown and Drake, which the police are still investigating, stood out in its weapons of choice.
abstract: Police continue their investigation into a fight at Club WiP in SoHo involving star rappers Chris Brown and Drake; incident stands apart in the weapons of choice not being guns or knives, but rather flying cubes of ice, cocktail glasses and high-priced bottles of liquor.

byline.contributor: Jon Caramanica, Aaron Edwards, Jim McKinley, Wendy Ruderman and Vivian Yee contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: A fight this week involving Chris Brown and Drake, which the police are still investigating, stood out in its weapons of choice.

headline.seo: In Brawl Involving Drake and Chris Brown, Flying Bottles and Ice
headline.main: In Celebrity Brawl at Club, a Scene of Flying Bottles and Ice Cubes
headline.print_headline: In Celebrity Brawl at Club, a Scene of Flying Bottles and Ice Cubes
